      • getClasspathProperties

        public static java.util.Properties getClasspathProperties(java.lang.String classpathLocation)
        For a given location this method will load the file into a properties object
        Parameters:
        classpathLocation - The loation of the properties file on the classpath as defined by Class.getResourceAsStream(String)
        Returns:
        The loaded properties bundle
        Throws:
        CsaRuntimeException - Thrown if an IOException is detected whilst loading the properties file
